gcc  -fopenmp -g -std=gnu11 -g -O0 -Wall -Wfatal-errors    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/decode_video.bin.dir/examples/decode_video.c.o  -o decode_video.bin  -L/shared/ffmpeg/lib  -L/shared/libzmq/lib -Wl,-rpath,/shared/ffmpeg/lib:/shared/libzmq/lib -lavdevice -lavfilter -lavformat -lavcodec -lswresample -lswscale -lavutil -lpostproc -lvdpau -lm -lxcb -lxcb-shm -lxcb-shape -ldl -lbz2 -lz -lpthread -llzma -lboost_program_options -lboost_serialization -lX11 -lopencv_core -lopencv_highgui -lopencv_imgproc
